Class WMessage

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.utils.wysiwyg.WMessage
public class WMessage extends Object
WYSIWYG-editor Message object Contains a series of WPage objects and methods for manipulating them. Also contains methods for parsing and building MULTI strings;
Author:
John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting

      public String normalize()
      Normalize a MULTI string.
      Returns:
      A MULTI string containing only valid characters and tags.

      Test if the WMessage is equal to another WMessage
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object

    • getLines

      public String[] getLines(int n_lines)
      Get message lines as an array of strings (with tags). Every n_lines elements in the returned array represent one page.
      Parameters:
      n_lines - Number of lines per page.
      Returns:
      A string array containing text for each line.

    • getFonts

      public int[] getFonts(int f_num)
      Get an array of font numbers.
      Parameters:
      f_num - Default font number, one based.
      Returns:
      An array of font numbers for each page of the message.

    • addWatcher

      public void addWatcher(WMsgWatcher watcher)

    • removeWatcher

      public void removeWatcher(WMsgWatcher watcher)

      public void pageChanged(int pageNo)
      Re-render page and then tell watchers

    • renderMsg

      public void renderMsg(MultiConfig mcfg, WEditorErrorManager errMan)
      Render all pages in message. Updates the raster image in all WPage(s)

    • setWysiwygImageSize

      public void setWysiwygImageSize(int pixWidth, int pixHeight) throws InvalidMsgException
      Set the WYSIWYG image size on each page's raster.
      Throws:
      InvalidMsgException

    • renderMsg

      public void renderMsg(MultiConfig mcfg)
      Render all pages in message without any error management Updates the raster image in all WPage(s)

    • containsAny

      public boolean containsAny(WTokenType type)
      Test for a specific token-type anywhere in the message.
      Parameters:
      type - WTokenType to look for
      Returns:
      true if a token of that type was found, false if it was not.

    • removeAll

      public boolean removeAll(WTokenType type)
      Remove all tokens of a specific token-type anywhere in the message.
      Parameters:
      type - WTokenType to look for
      Returns:
      true if any tokens of that type were removed, false if none were found.

    • isStandby

      public boolean isStandby()
      Test for standby tag in message

    • setStandby

      public void setStandby(boolean bStandby)
      Add or remove standby token in message
